description: This file appears to be a C source file implementing Wi-Fi application management and event handling for the 'wifi_apps_mgr' module. It contains functions for managing Wi-Fi apps, handling events, and related threading and synchronization logic.

classes.name: wifi_app_t
classes.description: Structure representing a Wi-Fi application instance, containing control info, event queue, thread ID, synchronization primitives, and application-specific descriptors.

classes.name: wifi_apps_mgr_t
classes.description: Structure managing multiple Wi-Fi applications, containing a map of app instances and control references.

classes.name: wifi_event_t
classes.description: Structure representing a Wi-Fi event with type, subtype, and associated data.

methods.name: wifi_app_t * get_app_by_inst(wifi_apps_mgr_t * apps_mgr,wifi_app_inst_t inst)
methods.description: Retrieves a Wi-Fi application instance based on its instance ID.

methods.name: void * app_detached_event_func(void * data)
methods.description: Thread function handling detached application events, waiting and processing queued events.

methods.name: int push_event_to_app_queue(wifi_app_t * app,wifi_event_t * event)
methods.description: Clones an event and pushes it onto the application's event queue, signaling the event thread.

methods.name: int apps_mgr_event(wifi_apps_mgr_t * apps_mgr,wifi_event_t * event)
methods.description: Processes incoming events, dispatching to the relevant applications based on unicast or broadcast logic.

methods.name: int apps_mgr_analytics_event(wifi_apps_mgr_t * apps_mgr,wifi_event_type_t type,wifi_event_subtype_t sub_type,void * arg)
methods.description: Creates and dispatches an analytics-specific Wi-Fi event to the analytics application.

methods.name: int apps_mgr_sm_event(wifi_apps_mgr_t * apps_mgr,wifi_event_type_t type,wifi_event_subtype_t sub_type,void * arg)
methods.description: Creates and dispatches a system management event to the system management application.

methods.name: int apps_mgr_cac_event(wifi_apps_mgr_t * apps_mgr,wifi_event_type_t type,wifi_event_subtype_t sub_type,void * arg,int len)
methods.description: Creates and dispatches a CAC (Channel Access Control) event to the relevant application.

methods.name: int app_deinit(wifi_app_t * app,unsigned int create_flag)
methods.description: Deinitializes an app, cancelling its thread if detached.

methods.name: int app_init(wifi_app_t * app,unsigned int create_flag)
methods.description: Initializes an application, setting up necessary synchronization primitives and threads if detached.

methods.name: int update_rfc_params(wifi_app_descriptor_t * descriptor)
methods.description: Updates RFC parameters in the application descriptor based on stored configuration.

methods.name: int app_register(wifi_apps_mgr_t * apps_mgr,wifi_app_descriptor_t * descriptor)
methods.description: Registers a new application instance based on its descriptor, allocating resources.

methods.name: int apps_mgr_update(wifi_app_t * app)
methods.description: Updates application configurations by calling its update function.

methods.name: int apps_mgr_init(wifi_ctrl_t * ctrl,wifi_app_descriptor_t * descriptor,unsigned int num_apps)
methods.description: Initializes the applications manager with specified descriptors.
